FuncDef: This command displays static hosts configured on this service.
CLIs: static-host [ sap <sap-id> ] [ wholesaler <service-id> ] [ port <port-id> ] [ inter-dest-id <intermediate-destination-id> ] [ detail ] [ mac <ieee-address> ] [ ip-address <ip-prefix> [ </prefix-length> ] ]
static-host [ sap <sap-id> ] [ wholesaler <service-id> ] [ port <port-id> ] no-inter-dest-id [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Specifies the intermediate destination identifier which is encoded in the identification strings up to 32 characters.
The service ID of the wholesaler (applies only to the 7750 SR). Values-1 to 2147483647.
